transform_id.description: The id of the transform to delete

force.description: When `true`, the transform is deleted regardless of its current state. The default value is `false`, meaning that the transform must be `stopped` before it can be deleted.

delete_dest_index.description: When `true`, the destination index is deleted together with the transform. The default value is `false`, meaning that the destination index will not be deleted.

timeout.description: Controls the time to wait for the transform deletion
